title: Begin NFT Art Collaboration
subtitle: Collaborate with our Amazing Artists.
para: The development of the Thinkr (Series 1) artwork will honor some of the great thinkers who have come before us. At the forefront of this project will be absolute transparency. We want our community members to feel involved and understand what’s going on at all times during the project’s most important stages.

title: Begin Smart Contract Development
subtitle: Coding coding coding...keep them fingers coding
para: The accuracy of the code written for our smart contracts is of the utmost importance. All code written for our smart contracts is final once published to the Ethereum Mainnet. We take the accuracy of the code very seriously because any errors found in the code could allow exploits to go undetected for years to come. This is why we need to be incredibly deliberate and precise when crafting our smart contracts so we can be confident in our project’s core foundation for the foreseeable future.

title: THINK List
subtitle: Giving back to our earliest supporters
para: Thinkr would be nothing without our community. A select few who chose to believe in our project from the beginning will be given the chance to mint our first NFT series from our THINK List.

title: Thinkr (Series 1) NFT Mint Date
subtitle: Dutch Auction and Mint Prices
para: Unveil and announce our Thinkr (Series 1) NFT collection. Announcement will include when the collection can be minted and the community chosen prices that can be expected during the Dutch Auction.

title: The Dreamr DAO Opening Day
subtitle: Details on the official launch
para: Revealing The Dreamer DAO and the Dreamr NFT required for access. Also starting the process of educating the community about how they can join, vote, and more. The Dreamr DAO serves as a fundamental layer of our community engagement so we can’t wait to share more with you about this aspect of our project.

title: $THINKR Utility Explained
subtitle: Details on how we plan to use our ERC-20 token
para: Announcing how we incorporate our ERC-20 $THINK token in our future plans. There are exciting use cases we have in store for these tokens.
